title: Just Eat Rejects Hostile Bid, and a Bidding War Could Be Next
text:
Just Eat stock soared more than 26% on Tuesday after Naspers, the South African media and tech conglomerate, launched a hostile £4.9 billion (about $6.3 billion) all-cash offer for the U.K. food delivery firm to try to break up an agreed merger with its Dutch rival Takeaway.com.

The back story. In July, Just Eat and Takeaway announced plans to merge in an £8.2 billion deal, which would create the world’s largest online food delivery business outside of China and would compete with UberEats.

...
description: Just Eat stock soared after Naspers launched a £4.9 billion all-cash offer for the U.K. food delivery company that aimed to break up its agreed merger with Dutch rival Takeaway.com.
